summary.span: 提供顯示少量動態內容的輕量型控制項。

span.span: Provides a lightweight control for displaying small amounts of flow content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以包含在字串及其屬性或非固定格式內容項目，例如， ，和，請在其屬性。A can contain a string in its property or flow content elements, such as , , and , in its property. 設計成輕量級，以及特別是在整合到非固定格式內容的小部份專為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。 is designed to be lightweight, and is geared specifically at integrating small portions of flow content into a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 適用於單一線條顯示，並提供良好的效能，最多幾行內容的顯示。 is optimized for single-line display, and provides good performance for displaying up to a few lines of content. 不適合需要顯示多個幾行內容的案例對於這類情況中，加上適當的檢視控制項是較好的選擇，比，效能方面。 is not optimized for scenarios that need to display more than a few lines of content; for such scenarios, a coupled with an appropriate viewing control is a better choice than , in terms of performance. 在後，是下一步 的最小的-權數控制項，顯示非固定格式內容，而只提供少量的捲動內容區域[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。After , is the next lightest-weight control for displaying flow content, and simply provides a scrolling content area with minimal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 被最佳化的非固定格式內容的 「 頁面-一次 」 檢視模式。 is optimized around "page-at-a-time" viewing mode for flow content. 最後，支援最豐富的設定功能，來檢視非固定格式內容，但對應的吃重。Finally, supports the richest set functionality for viewing flow content, but is correspondingly heavier-weight. 水平對齊文字內是使用屬性。Horizontally aligning text within a is done with the property. 對齊內頁面的配置利用和屬性。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 元素。The following example shows how to use the element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimpleXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textblocksimplexaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： Textblock 和按鈕](~/add/media/textblock-simple.png "螢幕擷取畫面： Textblock 和按鈕")![Screenshot: TextBlocks and buttons](~/add/media/textblock-simple.png "Screenshot: TextBlocks and buttons") 下列範例會示範如何顯示如何達成類似結果以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to shows how to achieve similar results programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textblocksimple)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockSimple](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textblocksimple)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何子項目上的設定覆寫這個最上層的設定。Any settings on child elements override this top-level setting. 如果未指定多個系列的第二個和後續的字型系列會作為後援，可在其中主要字型系列是無法使用或不適用的情況下使用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此屬性會指定只在喜好設定。This property specifies a preference only. 如果無法使用，指定的字型家族以無訊息模式切換回所決定的字型值。If the specified font family is not available, the silently falls back to the font determined by the value. 這個相依性屬性也會有附加的屬性使用方式。This dependency property also has an attached property usage. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用量`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動文字斷字功能可讓自動中斷和進行斷字，根據目前的版面配置條件。The automatic word hyphenation feature enables a to automatically break and hyphenate words, based on current layout conditions. 這可讓長字詞，若要開始在同一行，並繼續這個下一步，並傾向於達到合理的文字中的泛空白字元更均勻分佈。This enables long words to begin on one line and continue on this next, and tends to achieve a more even distribution of white space in justified text. 文字會中斷，並根據標準的文法規則進行無連字號。Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

member this.Padding : System.Windows.Thickness with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出內容區域界限和 顯示內容之間的填補空間寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the thickness of padding space between the boundaries of the content area, and the content displayed by a .

value.span: 結構，指定要套用的填補數量 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A structure specifying the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在所有方向的統一可描述 (`Padding="10"`)，或是為四個不同值，代表左前,，以滑鼠右鍵，然後底端填補獨立 (`Padding="5,0,10,20"`)。 can be described as uniform in all directions (`Padding="10"`), or as four distinct values that represent left, top, right, and bottom padding independently (`Padding="5,0,10,20"`). 如果指定的填補寬度超過對應的內容區域維度 （例如，左和右邊框距離寬度的總和超過內容區域的寬度），填補的粗細會按比例減少到不可大於相關內容區域的維度。If a specified padding thickness exceeds the corresponding content area dimension (for example, the sum of the left and right padding widths exceeds the content area width), the thickness of the padding is proportionally reduced to be no greater than the relevant content area dimension. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *uniformThickness**uniformThickness* 單一的字串表示法一致地套用所有的四個粗細維度值。String representation of a single value to apply uniformly to all four thickness dimensions. 例如，值`"10"`相當於針對`"10,10,10,10"`。For example, a value of `"10"` is equivalent to a value of `"10,10,10,10"`. 不合格的值被以與裝置無關的像素。An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels. 字串不需要明確包含小數位數。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. *independentThickness**independentThickness* 四個已排序的字串表示法值對應至獨立的粗細維度 left，top，以滑鼠右鍵，並 bottom，依此順序。String representation of four ordered values corresponding to independent thickness dimensions for left, top, right, and bottom, in this order. 四個值必須是以逗號分隔的;不允許有空格。The four values must be separated with commas; spaces are not allowed. 比方說，「 5,10,15,20"會導致 5 像素的邊框距離左邊的內容、 內容上方填補的 10 個像素、 15 像素的邊框間距右邊的內容和 20 個像素內容下方的填補。For example, "5,10,15,20" results in 5 pixels of padding to the left of content, 10 pixels of padding above content, 15 pixels of padding to the right of content, and 20 pixels of padding below the content. *qualifiedUniformThickness**qualifiedUniformThickness* 所描述的值*uniformThickness*後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *uniformThickness* followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 比方說，`"1in"`提供統一的填補，往所有方向的 1 英吋。For example, `"1in"` provides uniform padding of 1 inch in all directions. *qualifiedIndependentThickness**qualifiedIndependentThickness* 所描述的值*independentThickness*，以每個獨立的值，後面接著一個下列的單位規範： `px`， `in`。A value described by *independentThickness*, with each independent value followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`. `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 是英吋為單位;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px 例如，`"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`。For example, `"1.5in,0.8in,1.5in,0.8in"`. 單位規範可能會混合，或從一個或多個值中省略。Unit specifiers may be mixed or omitted from one or more values. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性的項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_TextBlockPropsXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textblockpropsxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. summary.span: 取得或設定 ，其中包含要套用至 之文字的效果。

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是您可以新增至文字的視覺裝飾。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四種類型的文字裝飾： 底線、 基準、 刪除線和頂線。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 如需文字裝飾的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 建立文字裝飾](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). 根據預設，這個屬性設定為`null`且沒有與其相關聯。By default, this property is set to `null` and has no associated with it. 然後再加入任何文字效果，建立新並將它指派給這個屬性。Before adding any text effects, create a new and assign it to this property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_TextBlock_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textblock_textdecxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下圖顯示如何， ，和分別裝飾呈現。The following figures show how the , , and decorations render, respectively. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_TextBlock_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textblock_textdec)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_TextBlock_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textblock_textdec)]
